component.name: Fightcade SteamOS Addon
component.summary: Quality-of-life enhancements for Fightcade on SteamOS and Steam Deck Gaming Mode

description.p: This addon provides quality-of-life enhancements for Fightcade on SteamOS and Steam Deck Gaming Mode.
It includes a workaround for external link not opening in Gaming Mode by integrating lightweight Min Browser.
Note: This addon is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by the official Fightcade team.
